channel.title: Some very sad news
channel.description: What's the packet for the right click options ?

item.title: Some very sad news
item.dc:creator: @x0_0wn x0 0wn
item.description:
@x0_0wn wrote:

[quote=“LeScape, post:42, topic:187604”][quote author=xx qwertyuiop xx link=topic=250222.msg2097973#msg2097973 date=1205060490]

ok umm yes sad

ok umm yes spam.

Yay, a quote pyramid challenge has been thrown down! Lol.

Yes, Yay, a quote pyarmid challegance has been thrown down! Lol.

.>
Anyone got it ?

I got it.

i already gave it

lol, ok, I never saw it. Sorry.

sees!!

right click npc or right click players
be more specific

case 17: // second Click npc case 153://Command slot - 2

Yeah, I’m having trouble.

Currently, Admins have ’ Attack ’ as their walk here…
And I can’t find the ’ Attack ’ that I need to change…

/* case 128://Command slot - 1 slot1 = inStream.readUnsignedWord(); break; case 153://Command slot - 2 slot2 = inStream.readUnsignedWordBigEndian(); break; case 73://Command slot - 3 slot3 = inStream.readSignedWordBigEndian(); break; case 139://Command slot - 4 slot4 = inStream.readSignedWordBigEndian(); break; case 39://Command slot - 5 slot5 = inStream.readUnsignedWordBigEndian(); break;*/

Oh, forgot to tell you, my server is different, I don’t have that.
I got if(playerRights <= 1) { outStream.createFrameVarSize(104); outStream.writeByteC(4); // command slot (does it matter which one?) outStream.writeByteA(0); // 0 or 1; 0 if command should be placed on top in context menu outStream.writeString("Trade With"); outStream.endFrameVarSize(); }

Like that lol

oh ya![quote author=LeScape link=topic=250222.msg2097920#msg2097920 date=1205059556]

ok umm yes sad

ok umm yes spam.

Yay, a quote pyramid challenge has been thrown down! Lol.

Yes, Yay, a quote pyarmid challegance has been thrown down! Lol.

.>

I got it.

i already gave it

sees!!

case 17: // second Click npc case 153://Command slot - 2

Yeah, I’m having trouble.

Currently, Admins have ’ Attack ’ as their walk here…
And I can’t find the ’ Attack ’ that I need to change…

/* case 128://Command slot - 1 slot1 = inStream.readUnsignedWord(); break; case 153://Command slot - 2 slot2 = inStream.readUnsignedWordBigEndian(); break; case 73://Command slot - 3 slot3 = inStream.readSignedWordBigEndian(); break; case 139://Command slot - 4 slot4 = inStream.readSignedWordBigEndian(); break; case 39://Command slot - 5 slot5 = inStream.readUnsignedWordBigEndian(); break;*/

Oh, forgot to tell you, my server is different, I don’t have that.
I got if(playerRights <= 1) { outStream.createFrameVarSize(104); outStream.writeByteC(4); // command slot (does it matter which one?) outStream.writeByteA(0); // 0 or 1; 0 if command should be placed on top in context menu outStream.writeString("Trade With"); outStream.endFrameVarSize(); }

Like that lol

damn, just had to add to this lol

Oh yeah…

no it is not different i gave you the packets
what you just posted was found in run() i think?

Well I don’t have /* case 128://Command slot - 1 slot1 = inStream.readUnsignedWord(); break; case 153://Command slot - 2 slot2 = inStream.readUnsignedWordBigEndian(); break; case 73://Command slot - 3 slot3 = inStream.readSignedWordBigEndian(); break; case 139://Command slot - 4 slot4 = inStream.readSignedWordBigEndian(); break; case 39://Command slot - 5 slot5 = inStream.readUnsignedWordBigEndian(); break;*/ :[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 09, 2008, 02:52:47 PM[/size][hr]And yes, it was found in run()

Lol love it.

Just use println…

Teh rofls

ohya

Lool, this owns.

[b]IT’S QUITE UNFORTUNATE THAT THE MODS DON’T LOOK AFTER THE FORUMZ

[size=99pt][b][color=red]I MUST AGREE[/size]

What’s printnl ? :\

System.out.println(String)
[/quote]
What the fuck, you said exactly what I was going to say.
[/quote]
LolOlxsw[/quote]

Yah, ok.
I r be scared now lemme try tis epic System.out.println(String) you speak of.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 09, 2008, 06:25:19 PM[/size][hr][quote=“x0 0wn”][quote author=LeScape link=topic=250222.msg2097977#msg2097977 date=1205060515]

I got if(playerRights <= 1) { outStream.createFrameVarSize(104); outStream.writeByteC(4); // command slot (does it matter which one?) outStream.writeByteA(0); // 0 or 1; 0 if command should be placed on top in context menu outStream.writeString("Trade With"); outStream.endFrameVarSize(); }

Like that lol
[/quote]

damn, just had to add to this lol[/quote]

Oh yeah…

[quote=“openice123, post:21, topic:187604”]no it is not different i gave you the packets
what you just posted was found in run() i think?[/quote]

Well I don’t have /* case 128://Command slot - 1 slot1 = inStream.readUnsignedWord(); break; case 153://Command slot - 2 slot2 = inStream.readUnsignedWordBigEndian(); break; case 73://Command slot - 3 slot3 = inStream.readSignedWordBigEndian(); break; case 139://Command slot - 4 slot4 = inStream.readSignedWordBigEndian(); break; case 39://Command slot - 5 slot5 = inStream.readUnsignedWordBigEndian(); break;*/ :[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 09, 2008, 02:52:47 PM[/size][hr]And yes, it was found in run()
